attributes.action: Separate Church and State - Stop Forcing Children to Undergo Religious Education in Schools
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is wrong for the state to force the teaching of religion in schools.
If a parent wants thier child taught religious studies this should be done through their church, thier home or through Church aided schools. Non religious children feel humiliated and discriminataed against by current religious teaching practices

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
